system.description:
While you are attuned to and wearing a transforming cloak, you gain resistance to a type of damage and you can use an action to activate an elemental form that lasts for 1 hour, until you fall unconscious, or you use a bonus action to end it.

Once you have used the cloak to take on an elemental form, you cannot use that property again until you have finished a long rest.

This cloak appears to be made of living flames, though it does not burn.

While your fire form is active you gain:

  • immunity to fire damage

  • your weapon attacks deal fire damage

  • when a creature hits you with a melee weapon attack they take 1d6 fire damage

  • you can fit through spaces at least an inch wide without squeezing

  • you gain a climb speed equal to your Speed.
